description: This is a request for proposal for the Department of National Defence for ShareGate licenses.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
====================================

**Project Title:** SSC ShareGate (or Equivalent) for the Department of National Defence
**Contract Reference Number:** SSC-23-00022928:T
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** BPM018959/22928

**Notice Details**
----------------

* **Publication Date:** June 28, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** July 12, 2023 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** July 11, 2023

**Project Description**
----------------------

This project involves the acquisition of net new ShareGate (or equivalent) licenses for the Department of National Defence. Interested bidders can register in the Shared Services Canada (SSC) P2P portal to view and access solicitations, submit responses, and receive updates and amendments.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **End User:** Department of National Defence
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Contact Person:** Clara Whittaker
* **Email:** [clara.whittaker@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:clara.whittaker@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** 343-553-8354
* **Fax:** 343-553-8354

**Attachments**
--------------

* View attachments on the SSC P2P portal at: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/04A7CE56-96DC-499A-B6C6-D2A589879904 and https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/0896D075-637E-4EB1-A472-7E43B6202900

This solicitation is for the purchase of net new ShareGate (or equivalent) licenses. The SSC P2P portal is the main source of information for this solicitation, including the Invitation to Bid (ITB) package, solicitation document, and amendments. Bidders are required to register in the SSC P2P portal to access the solicitation and submit a response.

Please note that the tender closing date is July 12, 2023 14:00:00. Amendment 01 provides clarification on the SKUs
